quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Wild Bunch
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, kelevra. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How much money does Nick Fisher owe Slim Hopkins/The Boss in Lucky Number Slevin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $96,000

questions.question: In what year was the movie The Wild Bunch released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969

questions.question: Kelevra, the last name of the protagonist in Lucky Number Slevin, roughly translated in Hebrew means good cat.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This fine character, who played Coffer in The Wild Bunch, is best known as the Warden in Cool Hand Luke.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Strother Martin

questions.question: What year was the movie Lucky Number Slevin released to theaters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2006

questions.question: He starred as Sam the Lion in The Last Picture Show and was a frequent co-star on John  Wayne movies. He played Tector Gorch in The Wild Bunch.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ben Johnson

questions.question: Over 10,000 squibs were used in the film The Wild Bunch. What is a squib?

options.text: An old film technique in which animation is mixed with real people.
A film technique in which a few  vehicles  look like a long line of  vehicles.
A  method of over dubbing the audio of a scene to make it appear as if many people are talking.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A simulated bullet hit.

questions.question: What were the Bosss henchmens names in Lucky Number Slevin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elvis  Sloe

questions.question: How many people are killed in the movie The Wild Bunch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 145

questions.question: This actor was the male lead in The Wild Bunch and also starred in The Bridge on the River Kwai.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: William Holden

questions.question: This actor played Deke Thornton, the man trying to capture The Wild Bunch. He was also the  pessimistic Colonel in The Dirty Dozen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Ryan

questions.question: This actor, who starred in the film Marty and on the sitcom McHales Navy, played Duke Engstrom in the movie The Wild Bunch.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ernest Borgnine

questions.question: Two of the stuntmen in the movie The Wild Bunch were Tap and Joe Canutt. What was the first name of their father who was also a stuntman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yakima

questions.question: What is the name of Bruce Willis character in the movie Lucky Number Slevin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Goodkat

questions.question: The Shmoo, referenced by the Boss in the film Lucky Number Slevin, was actually a cartoon character in the late 70s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Money and Rat Race
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, smiler, traction. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: After ending up in traction and being arrested for the theft of the money, Capt. Culpepper says that he will never laugh again. However, something happens in the hospital room to make him finally laugh. What happens in the hospital room at the end of Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World?

options.text: Mrs. Marcus, the loud-mouthed, pestering mother-in-law to J. Russell Finch, slips on a banana and hurts her bottom.
Culpepper realizes he knows where there is more money hidden by Smiler Grogan.
The police do not charge Culpepper for taking the money.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mrs. Marcus, the loud-mouthed, pestering mother-in-law to J. Russell Finch, slips on a banana and hurts her bottom.

questions.question: Did the character Enrico Pollini suffer from the medical condition narcolepsy in the move Rat Race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Who directed Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World and Rat Race, respectively?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stanley Kramer and Jerry Zucker

questions.question: In Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, Captain Culpepper finds the money and heads to Canada.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, how much money did Smiler hide?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $350,000

questions.question: The movie Rat Race was inspired by Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World and had the same basic plot. What year did Rat Race come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2001

questions.question: In Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, what were the professions of the five people who witnessed Smiler Grogans death?

options.text: teacher, nurse, dentist, foreman, and professional sports player
edible seaweed company owner, dentist, two comedy writers, and truck driver
doctor, lawyer, Indian chief, vagabond, and secretary
business manager, stunt man, scientist, movie producer, and psychiatrist

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: edible seaweed company owner, dentist, two comedy writers, and truck driver

questions.question: In the movie Rat Race, who played the eccentric woman with the squirrels?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kathy Bates

questions.question: In what city is the train station with the storage locker located in the movie Rat Race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Silver City, NM

questions.question: What type of aircraft do the Crumps charter to get to Santa Rosita in Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: World War I era biplane

questions.question: Who played the bystanders at the scene of Smiler Grogans car accident in Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World?

options.text: Mickey Rooney, Buddy Hackett, Jonathan Winters, Sid Caesar, and Milton Berle
Jonathan Winters, Buddy Hackett, William Demarest, Andy Devine, and Carl Reiner
Mickey Rooney, Milton Berle, Norman Fell, Edie Adams, and Peter Falk
Sid Caesar, Jim Backus, Jonathan Winters, Selma Diamond, and Jerry Lewis

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mickey Rooney, Buddy Hackett, Jonathan Winters, Sid Caesar, and Milton Berle

questions.question: How much money was up for grabs in the movie Rat Race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $2,000,000

questions.question: In Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, what happens at the new gas station owned by Irwin and Ray?

options.text: All of the various groups looking for the money show up at the gas station at the same time.
Lennie Pike destroys the gas station.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lennie Pike destroys the gas station.

questions.question: Who played bank robber Smiler Grogan in Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jimmy Durante

questions.question: In Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, once the witnesses have heard about the money Smiler has stashed, they begin their race to Santa Rosita. Unbeknownst to them, the Captain of the the Santa Rosita police department, C. G. Culpepper, has been working on Smilers case and suspects that the others know where the money is. Consequently, he tracks their movements, hoping to be led to the money. Who played this cagey police captain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spencer Tracy

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Shrek
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, fiona, princess. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the donkey, voiced by Eddie Murphy, in the 2001 animated movie Shrek?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donkey

questions.question: How does Shrek wake up the sleeping Princess Fiona when he finds her in the castle surrounded by lava and protected by a fire-breathing dragon in the 2001 movie Shrek?

options.text: He sets the alarm of his clock.
He rudely shakes her shouting Wake up!.
He pours a jug of water on her face.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He rudely shakes her shouting Wake up!.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ambulance driver

questions.question: In the 2001 animated comedy movie Shrek, the donkey falls in love with what character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dragon

questions.question: Who played Billy Jack in the popular series of movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Laughlin

questions.question: What is written on a sign near Sheks home in the 2001 animated comedy movie Shrek?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beware the Ogre!

questions.question: Were Tom Laughlin and Delores Taylor married when they starred in the Billy Jack movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What is the meaning of the German word Schreck from which Shreks name is derived?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terror

questions.question: Which musical act performed at the charity event at the end of the movie Rat Race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Smashmouth

questions.question: What year did the movie The Trial of Billy Jack come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1974

questions.question: Discredited NFL referee Owen Templeton ends up driving a bus full of Mae West look-alikes in the movie Rat Race.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What year was the movie Billy Jack Goes to Washington released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1977

questions.question: Who played Jean Roberts in the Billy Jack movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Delores Taylor
